shankarachary-comm.meaning: The Devas then said to Vayu: “Learn O Vayu! what this Great Spirit is” He said: “yes.”
shankarachary-comm.comm: They next addressed Vayu thus: ‘know this, etc.’ The vest bears the same meaning as in the last passage

meaning: Meaning:Now they said to Vayu, "O Vayu, understand what this is. Is this something that can be controlled or not?"
